titleStmt.title: Miscellanea. The second part in four essays / by Sir William Temple ...
titleStmt.author: Temple, William, Sir, 1628-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Ri. and Ra. Simpson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
(from t.p.) I. Upon ancient and modern learning -- II. Upon the gardens of Epicurus -- III. Upon heroic virtue -- IV. Upon poetry.
